Package BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors

Class CanCoderFaults

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors.CanCoderFaults
All Implemented Interfaces:
FaultsWrapper
public class CanCoderFaults extends Object implements FaultsWrapper
Wrapper class for managing and detecting faults in a CANcoder device. Provides functionality to monitor and alert on various fault conditions.

    • hasFaultOccured

      Checks if any faults have occurred in the CANcoder device and activates the corresponding alerts.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
